item.description:
On Saturday, August 4th, we will be conducting a literature drop in Portsmouth's Ward 4. This is Portsmouth's most heavily Republican Ward, and it will be a great opportunity to provide literature to households that consistently vote in Republican primaries.

We will be meeting in the parking lot of the strip mall which holds the Fed Ex Kinko's Office & Print store, at 751 Lafayette Rd, at 2:00 PM. Maps, literature and walk lists will be provided by the campaign. Bring a comfortable pair of shoes and friend for two hours of spreading the message of freedom.

There is a little block party starting at 6 pm on Saturday. Not sure how big it will be since we only have five houses on the block, but any canvassers are welcome to come and cool off with a beverage or two. It's on Friend Street, which is a dead end off of Cass Street. This is about a half mile from Kinkos. Take a right out of the Kinkos parking lot onto Lafayette (not the Rt. 1 by-pass), this turns into Middle Street, and Cass Street is a left off of Middle (well before you hit downtown). We are the third house down on the left on the corner of Cass and Friend (254 Cass, tall white w/ fence). You'll see the Ron Paul sign and the beautiful front steps that Joel Winters built!
item.name: Portsmouth Lit Drop
